# Task 1: Summary Statistics and Boxplots

**Summary Statistics and Boxplot for Numerical Variables**

```{r}
str(EmployeeSurveyData)
```
```{r}
summary(EmployeeSurveyData)
```
```{r}
summary(EmployeeSurveyData$Age)
```
```{r}
summary(EmployeeSurveyData$YearofWork)
```
```{r}
boxplot(EmployeeSurveyData$Age, main="Age")
```
```{r}
boxplot(EmployeeSurveyData$YearofWork, main="YearofWork")
```
# Task 2: Factor Conversion

**Converting numerical variables to factors**

```{r}
EmployeeSurveyData$Age <- as.factor(EmployeeSurveyData$Age)
```
```{r}
str(EmployeeSurveyData$Age)
```
```{r}
EmployeeSurveyData$YearofWork <- as.factor(EmployeeSurveyData$YearofWork)
```
```{r}
str(EmployeeSurveyData$YearofWork)
```
# Task 3: Visualizations

**Plot the right visual for each column**

```{r}
boxplot(EmployeeSurveyData$Age, main="Age")
```
```{r}
boxplot(EmployeeSurveyData$YearofWork, main="YearofWork")
```
```{r}
pie(table(EmployeeSurveyData$Gender), main="Gender Distribution")
```
```{r}
barplot(table(EmployeeSurveyData$JobCharacteristic), main="JobCharacteristic")
```
```{r}
barplot(table(EmployeeSurveyData$BudgetaryDecisionsParticipation), main="BudgetaryDecisionsParticipation")
```
```{r}
barplot(table(EmployeeSurveyData$JobSatisfaction), main="JobSatisfaction")
```
```{r}
hist(EmployeeSurveyData$PromotionChance)
```
```{r}
barplot(table(EmployeeSurveyData$LevelofProud), main="LevelofProud")
```
```{r}
barplot(table(EmployeeSurveyData$RelationsBetweenEmployees), main="RelationsBetweenEmployees")
```
```{r}
hist(EmployeeSurveyData$TurnDownOtherJob)
```
# Task 4: Scatter Plots

**Plot scatter plots to show few relationships**

```{r}
scatter.smooth(EmployeeSurveyData$Age, EmployeeSurveyData$YearofWork)
```
```{r}
scatter.smooth(EmployeeSurveyData$YearofWork, EmployeeSurveyData$PromotionChance)
```
```{r}
scatter.smooth(EmployeeSurveyData$YearofWork, EmployeeSurveyData$TurnDownOtherJob)
```


```{r}
scatter.smooth(EmployeeSurveyData$JobSatisfaction, EmployeeSurveyData$LevelofProud)
```
